downloading now, thanks, and to everyone who has key issues, just go to youtube and look up "wow cataclysm keygen" there should be multiple videos that show keygens, you don't even need to download the keygens, just look for a video that has the keys visible.
world of warcraft keygens and gamecard keygens never work for offical servers since 2005.

this is for all private server players:
private servers won't be able to update to cataclysm, because blizzard is changing the op-code now every patch. We only got 80% of the correct Op-code atm since wow classic to 3.3.5 (5 years)
so most likely it is pointless to download world of warcraft cataclysm u also need a CD key for ur account to upgrade to world of warcraft cataclysm.
So all retail players just buy this game and do not waste ur time on this!!

Retail players probably dont need to download it anyway.
